Text: The NOTE messed up.  It should read, "This can be fixed by simply tapping the J key in VLC 3 or 4 times creating an audio delay of -150ms or -200 ms.

Hey Mike, you can permanently fix that audio delay using mkvmerge. Drop in the file, highlight the audio stream, click on format specific options at the bottom and put -150 in the delay setting. 2 minutes and done, easy-peezy.

It can be fixed if it has a constant delay from start else if delay from late or particular portion or delay at some points then its hard to adjust and mike is uploading several other things i guess we can adjust this little delays using our media players or respective software of other players etc
